songs.name: Jeth Ko Ghaam
songs.story:
In a quiet village surrounded by hills, Asha, an artist, and Rohan, a dreamer, found themselves drawn together despite the invisible lines of caste that divided them. Asha’s mural—a tree with entwined branches sheltering everyone—caught Rohan’s eye, sparking conversations about a world without labels.
But their bond stirred whispers in the village. One evening, by the river, Asha asked, "Do you think we can ever love freely, without these meters measuring our worth?"
Rohan held her hand, replying, "We must try. Love isn’t wrong—these rules are."
Their story, though brief, became a quiet rebellion, a hope for change.
songs.lyrics:
हामी सबैको भिन्दा-भिन्दै मोल हुँदो रहेछ,
मानिस ठूलो दिलले हुन्छ भन्थे जातले पो भएछ।

के तिम्रो टाउकोमा कुनै जातको मिटर छ?
तिम्रो-मेरो झैँ नामको थुप्रो किन त्यो शिखर छ?

सोँच्छौ र, माया लाउन पाईंदैन किन?
सोँच्छौ र, शब्द साट्या रूचाईंदैन?

नेवार, मगोंल, बाहुन, क्षेत्री, 
कामि, दमै यत्रैसित्ती।

के तिम्रो टाउकोमा कुनै जातको मिटर छ?
तिम्रो-मेरो झैँ नामको थुप्रो किन त्यो शिखर छ?

सोँच्छु म, छुन तिमीलाई पाँऊदिन किन?
लाग्दैन राम्रो जब टाढिन्छौँ हामी, जथाभावि।

नेवार, मगोंल, बाहुन, क्षेत्री, मुस्लिम, थारू, मदेशि, ठकुरि, पोँडे, शार्कि अनि कामि, दमै यत्रैसित्ती।

के तिम्रो टाउकोमा कुनै जातको मिटर छ?
तिम्रो-मेरो झैँ नामको थुप्रो किन त्यो शिखर छ?

हे तिम्रो टाउकोमा त्यो जातको मिटर छ!
तिम्रो-मेरो झैँ नामको थुप्रो कति अग्लो शिखर छ!

सोँच्छौ र, माया लाउन पाईंदैन किन?
सोँच्छौ र, शब्द साट्या रूचाईंदैन?

सोँच्छु म, छुन तिमीलाई सक्दिन किन?
लाग्दैन राम्रो जब टाढिन्छौँ हामी, जथाभावि।

songs.story:
In a quiet village surrounded by hills, Asha, an artist, and Rohan, a dreamer, found themselves drawn together despite the invisible lines of caste that divided them. Asha’s mural—a tree with entwined branches sheltering everyone—caught Rohan’s eye, sparking conversations about a world without labels.
But their bond stirred whispers in the village. One evening, by the river, Asha asked, "Do you think we can ever love freely, without these meters measuring our worth?"
Rohan held her hand, replying, "We must try. Love isn’t wrong—these rules are."
Their story, though brief, became a quiet rebellion, a hope for change.

सोँच्छौ र, शब्द साट्या रूचाईंदैन?

सोँच्छु म, छुन तिमीलाई सक्दिन किन?
लाग्दैन राम्रो जब टाढिन्छौँ हामी, जथाभावि।

songs.story:
In a quiet village surrounded by hills, Asha, an artist, and Rohan, a dreamer, found themselves drawn together despite the invisible lines of caste that divided them. songs.name: Asina Jhari
songs.story:
In a quiet village surrounded by hills, Asha, an artist, and Rohan, a dreamer, found themselves drawn together despite the invisible lines of caste that divided them. Asha’s mural—a tree with entwined branches sheltering everyone—caught Rohan’s eye, sparking conversations about a world without labels.
But their bond stirred whispers in the village. One evening, by the river, Asha asked, "Do you think we can ever love freely, without these meters measuring our worth?"
Rohan held her hand, replying, "We must try. Love isn’t wrong—these rules are."
Their story, though brief, became a quiet rebellion, a hope for change.
songs.lyrics:
असिना झरेर मन चिसियो होला
एक अँगाली देऊ न।
लेखेका शब्द सबै खेर जाला,
एक सुनाइ देऊ न।

सङ्गीत रचेको भावना सिर्जेको,
सबै खेर जाने पीरले  
आवाज जुटाएको।

जिन्दगी चल्छ र यसरी?
जिन्दगी चल्छ बेसरी।
कामकुरो खैर छैन,
भोको पेटमा बलै छैन।

बादल लागेछ,
गुम्सिएको मनमा,
गाठो फुकाउन,
आए म!

मेरो भाग्यमा दौडधूप मात्रै रहेछ,
भाग्यमानी खप्पड मात्रै रहेछ।

दुःखमा धैर्य राखी,
सुख आउने आशामा,
यो ज्योति निभ्दै छ, हरेक सासमा।

गलत दिशा हो कि म हिंड्ने?
उज्यालो छैन कतै पनि।
कि मैले जानिनँ,
बुद्धि पलाएन।

बादल लागेछ,
गुम्सिएको मनमा,
गाठो फुकाउन,
आए म!

असिना झरेर मन चिसिएको छ,
एक अँगाली देऊ न।

songs.name: Nahola Bholi
songs.story:
In a quiet village surrounded by hills, Asha, an artist, and Rohan, a dreamer, found themselves drawn together despite the invisible lines of caste that divided them. Asha’s mural—a tree with entwined branches sheltering everyone—caught Rohan’s eye, sparking conversations about a world without labels.
But their bond stirred whispers in the village. One evening, by the river, Asha asked, "Do you think we can ever love freely, without these meters measuring our worth?"
Rohan held her hand, replying, "We must try. Love isn’t wrong—these rules are."
Their story, though brief, became a quiet rebellion, a hope for change.
songs.lyrics:
म पहाडमा रुख देखि झुम्छु 
झरना सँगै बग्न मन पराउछु 

कोसेली हो यो,
बिरक्त भनेको 
कोसेली हो यो 
खुशी जती बटुल्यो त्यो 

कसै लाई नभन 
कहाँ लाग्छ डर 
खुर्केको त्यो मुटु लाई 
कस्को नै भर 

फेरी...
भोली नहोला 
साझको कर ले 
घाम जैलै झुल्किन्न 
उमेर को बल ले 
  
भर नपर, भर नपर आफ्नै,
भर नपर, सुनिदेउन मेरा कुरा
भर नपर, भर नपर आफ्नै,
भर नपर, मिठा छन् कति बात 
 
भर नपर, भर नपर आफ्नै,
भर नपर, सुनिदेउन मेरा कुरा
भर नपर, भर नपर आफ्नै,
भर नपर, भोली नहोला कि

songs.name: Hariyo Din
songs.story:
In a quiet village surrounded by hills, Asha, an artist, and Rohan, a dreamer, found themselves drawn together despite the invisible lines of caste that divided them. Asha’s mural—a tree with entwined branches sheltering everyone—caught Rohan’s eye, sparking conversations about a world without labels.
But their bond stirred whispers in the village. One evening, by the river, Asha asked, "Do you think we can ever love freely, without these meters measuring our worth?"
Rohan held her hand, replying, "We must try. Love isn’t wrong—these rules are."
Their story, though brief, became a quiet rebellion, a hope for change.
songs.lyrics:
यहाँ झरी परि‌राख्या छ
हामीलाई मनमा‌ पर्या छैन
जानु छ,‌ ल्याउनु छ, बनाउनु छ
पुग्न माथि 

आउ तिमी र म 
चट्टानित होऔँ न
हाँसी-हासीँ एक अर्कालाई 
हेरौँ न

ऊऊऊऊ..
ऊऊऊऊ..
ऊऊऊऊ..
ऊऊ..

आउ तिमी र म 
चट्टानित होऔँ न
हाँसी-हासीँ एक अर्कालाई 
हेरौँ न

हरियो छ दिन
हरियो  तिमी र म
हरियो छ दिन
हरियो यो संसार

songs.story:

songs.name: Muna
songs.story:
In a quiet village surrounded by hills, Asha, an artist, and Rohan, a dreamer, found themselves drawn together despite the invisible lines of caste that divided them. Asha’s mural—a tree with entwined branches sheltering everyone—caught Rohan’s eye, sparking conversations about a world without labels.
But their bond stirred whispers in the village. One evening, by the river, Asha asked, "Do you think we can ever love freely, without these meters measuring our worth?"
Rohan held her hand, replying, "We must try. Love isn’t wrong—these rules are."
Their story, though brief, became a quiet rebellion, a hope for change.
songs.lyrics:
सानी परि तिमी मेरो नजिक सँगै बसिदेउ न 
सधैं भरी मेरो हात समाइ म सँगै हिँडिदेउन 

बाटो भरी अन्धकारै भए पनि 
घाम हेर्न डाँडैडाँडा चडे पनि 
तिमी बनि दिनु मेरो चन्द्रमा 
अनि हिडि दिनु मसँगै सबै कुना 

तिमी मेरो मुना 
अनि मेरो सूर्यमुखी 
मेरो लालिगुँरास 
अनि मेरो waterlily

छाडि गए तिमीले पिडा लाग्ने छैन 
फर्केर आउनेछौ पनि म भन्दिन 
तात्पर्य तिमीले मलाई भुल्नु हुन्न 
माया गरेको भने मुसुक्क हास्नु न

तिमी मेरो मुना 
अनि मेरो सूर्यमुखी 
मेरो लालिगुँरास 
अनि मेरो waterlily

songs.name: Swopnil Nindra
songs.story:
In a quiet village surrounded by hills, Asha, an artist, and Rohan, a dreamer, found themselves drawn together despite the invisible lines of caste that divided them. Asha’s mural—a tree with entwined branches sheltering everyone—caught Rohan’s eye, sparking conversations about a world without labels.

Rohan held her hand, replying, "We must try. Love isn’t wrong—these rules are."

songs.lyrics:
तिम्रो स्वपनिल निन्द्रा रहोस् 
तिम्रो स्वपनिल निन्द्रा रहोस् 
तिम्रो स्वपनिल निन्द्रा रहोस् 
तिम्रो स्वपनिल निन्द्रा रहोस् 
तिम्रो स्वपनिल निन्द्रा रहोस् 
तिम्रो स्वपनिल निन्द्रा रहोस् 
तिम्रो स्वपनिल निन्द्रा रहोस् सधैं... 

कहिले काहिँ अतालिन्छौ हामी 
एक्लो पन लाई अँगालेर 
जिउन लाई पनि मरी हत्ते गर्नु पर्छ किन 

ख्यालै मा बितिजान्छ ति 
दुई सास मा अटेको जीवन 
दु:ख भन्दा नि ठुला कुरा हरु हुन्छन् 
जानी हेरौ न 

म कामना गर्छु
  
तिम्रो स्वपनिल निन्द्रा रहोस् 
तिम्रो स्वपनिल निन्द्रा रहोस् 
तिम्रो स्वपनिल निन्द्रा रहोस् 
तिम्रो स्वपनिल निन्द्रा रहोस् सधैं 


सधैं भरी  म  कुर्न  चाहन्न 
सधैं  भरी एसरी  नै 
तिमीलाई  पर्खदा   जुग  गएनी  मेरो 
म  कामना   गरिरहन्छु 
तिम्रो स्वपनिल निन्द्रा रहोस् 


तिम्रो स्वपनिल निन्द्रा रहोस् 
तिम्रो स्वपनिल निन्द्रा रहोस् 
तिम्रो स्वपनिल निन्द्रा रहोस् 
तिम्रो स्वपनिल निन्द्रा रहोस् सधैं

songs.name: Hieud
songs.story:
In a quiet village surrounded by hills, Asha, an artist, and Rohan, a dreamer, found themselves drawn together despite the invisible lines of caste that divided them. Asha’s mural—a tree with entwined branches sheltering everyone—caught Rohan’s eye, sparking conversations about a world without labels.
But their bond stirred whispers in the village. One evening, by the river, Asha asked, "Do you think we can ever love freely, without these meters measuring our worth?"
Rohan held her hand, replying, "We must try. Love isn’t wrong—these rules are."
Their story, though brief, became a quiet rebellion, a hope for change.
songs.lyrics:
कोशीश गरेनी गार्हो 
दुई चार शब्द बिराए नि 
सारा जीवन निशब्द हुन नदेउ 

रोउ, बरु रोउ 
यी आँखामा आसुँ रहुन्जेल 
दुई हात मा आट्  हराउन्जेल 
यी आँखामा आसुँ रहुन्जेल 
दुई हात मा आट्  हराउन्जेल 

जाडो लाग्छ, लाग्दो रहेछ 
दोश गरेनी दोशी नठहराइदा 

जाडो लाग्छ, लाग्दो रहेछ 
यो छाती फुटुन्जेल 
सास लिएनी नचिच्याउदा 

हे रगत, तिमी मा ताप हरायो 
हे मगज, भन न, भन न कता लुकायौ 
हे रगत, तिमी मा ताप हरायो 
हे मगज, भन न, भन न कता लुकायौ 

मेरो मलाई केही नि छैन 
केही नि छैन मलाई 

जाडो लाग्छ |

songs.name: Sano Mayalu
songs.story:
In a quiet village surrounded by hills, Asha, an artist, and Rohan, a dreamer, found themselves drawn together despite the invisible lines of caste that divided them. Asha’s mural—a tree with entwined branches sheltering everyone—caught Rohan’s eye, sparking conversations about a world without labels.
But their bond stirred whispers in the village. One evening, by the river, Asha asked, "Do you think we can ever love freely, without these meters measuring our worth?"
Rohan held her hand, replying, "We must try. Love isn’t wrong—these rules are."
Their story, though brief, became a quiet rebellion, a hope for change.
songs.lyrics:
असिना झरेर मन चिसियो होला
एक अँगाली देऊ न।
लेखेका शब्द सबै खेर जाला,
एक सुनाइ देऊ न।

सङ्गीत रचेको भावना सिर्जेको,
सबै खेर जाने पीरले  
आवाज जुटाएको।

जिन्दगी चल्छ र यसरी?
जिन्दगी चल्छ बेसरी।
कामकुरो खैर छैन,
भोको पेटमा बलै छैन।

बादल लागेछ,
गुम्सिएको मनमा,
गाठो फुकाउन,
आए म!

मेरो भाग्यमा दौडधूप मात्रै रहेछ,
भाग्यमानी खप्पड मात्रै रहेछ।

दुःखमा धैर्य राखी,
सुख आउने आशामा,
यो ज्योति निभ्दै छ, हरेक सासमा।

गलत दिशा हो कि म हिंड्ने?
उज्यालो छैन कतै पनि।
कि मैले जानिनँ,
बुद्धि पलाएन।

बादल लागेछ,
गुम्सिएको मनमा,
गाठो फुकाउन,
आए म!

असिना झरेर मन चिसिएको छ,
एक अँगाली देऊ न।

songs.name: Ma Sudhrinchu
songs.story:
In a quiet village surrounded by hills, Asha, an artist, and Rohan, a dreamer, found themselves drawn together despite the invisible lines of caste that divided them. Asha’s mural—a tree with entwined branches sheltering everyone—caught Rohan’s eye, sparking conversations about a world without labels.
But their bond stirred whispers in the village. One evening, by the river, Asha asked, "Do you think we can ever love freely, without these meters measuring our worth?"
Rohan held her hand, replying, "We must try. Love isn’t wrong—these rules are."
Their story, though brief, became a quiet rebellion, a hope for change.
songs.lyrics:
यहाँ झरी परि‌राख्या छ
हामीलाई मनमा‌ पर्या छैन
जानु छ,‌ ल्याउनु छ, बनाउनु छ
पुग्न माथि 

आउ तिमी र म 
चट्टानित होऔँ न
हाँसी-हासीँ एक अर्कालाई 
हेरौँ न

ऊऊऊऊ..
ऊऊऊऊ..
ऊऊऊऊ..
ऊऊ..

आउ तिमी र म 
चट्टानित होऔँ न
हाँसी-हासीँ एक अर्कालाई 
हेरौँ न

हरियो छ दिन
हरियो  तिमी र म
हरियो छ दिन
हरियो यो संसार
